issues.description: Constructor parameter mismatch in PersonController: the solution implementation of PersonController only declares a constructor with parameters (String baseUrl, Duration timeout), but H05E01ClientApplication (both in template and solution) instantiates PersonController using the no-argument constructor (new PersonController()). The problem statement also explicitly reminds students to provide a constructor for PersonController. This mismatch in the solution repository is a structural inconsistency that will cause compilation errors and confuse students about which constructor to implement/use.
